lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Reagan's speech, widely regarded as critical to his hopes of repairing his presidency, was his first detailed response to last week's scorching Tower commission report on the secret sale of arms to Iran and diversion of profits to U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: His remark seemed to be a reference to a new Soviet willingness to reach an agreement on eliminating medium-range nuclear missiles in Europe.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "When it came to managing the NSC (National Security Council) staff, let's face it, my style didn't match its previous track record," Reagan said in a television address to the American people.
